name: Dungeon of the Lost King
description:
You have finally found the dungeon of the old lost king, but can you find the treasure?

You are equipped with magical colored keys, i wonder what they can be used for

The dungeon is filled with possessed mystical enemies...and remember... death is good.

CONTROLS

W,A,S,D - Movement

Shift - Sprint

Left Mouse - Shoot

1,2,3,4 - Fire Modes
